snippet: Top-ranked Djokovic suffered his earliest loss in three years when he was stunned by No. 55 Jiri Vesely in the second round of the Masters....
lead_paragraph: Top-ranked Djokovic suffered his earliest loss in three years when he was stunned by No. 55 Jiri Vesely in the second round of the Masters.

headline.main: Novak Djokovic Stunned in Monte Carlo Masters

abstract: Jiri Vesely beats top-ranked Novak Djokovic, 6-4, 2-6, 6-4, in second round of Monte Carlo Masters in Monaco.
